synopsis.p: Simple script search and replace function.

description.p: The program performs simple search and replace operations on a text file known as a script. The script file contains special tags in the form of HTML comments that are replaced with text taken from a lookup table.
The lookup table is an XML database containing a list of tags to search for and the replacement text to subsitute:

description.p: The lookup table and script are read from the two files specified on the command line, the resultant output text is written to standard output.
